snippet.title: Tales of Arise - E3 Announcement Trailer | PS4, X1, PC
snippet.description:
Challenge the fate that binds you! Experience the next evolution in the "Tales of" series with a rich story featuring a new cast of characters, updated combat, and classic "Tales of" gameplay

Tales of Arise is coming to PS4, X1, and PC in 2020. 

#TOARISE #BandaiNamco #E3

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous/?hl=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS/
Tumblr: http://bandainamcous.tumblr.com/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
